channel.title: ScanX – Stocks
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX Stocks news

item.title: Firstsource Solutions Receives Credit Rating Outlook Upgrade from CRISIL
item.description: Top News Firstsource Solutions Receives Credit Rating Outlook Upgrade from CRISIL 3 hours ago CRISIL Ratings has upgraded the outlook on Firstsource Solutions' long-term bank facilities to Positive from Stable while reaffirming the CRISIL A+ rating. The short-term rating has been maintained at CRISIL A1. The rating covers total bank loan facilities worth ₹470 crores, and the company disclosed this development to stock exchanges on December 10, 2024, in compliance with SEBI regulations.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Close in Red, IndiGo Crisis Deepens
item.description: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Close in Red, IndiGo Crisis Deepens 11 hours ago Indian stock markets ended negative, with Nifty 50 and BSE Sensex both down 0.32%. Market breadth favored decliners, with 2,382 stocks falling versus 2,166 advancing. IndiGo's operational crisis, Biocon's biologics consolidation, ICICI Bank's stake increase in its AMC, Infosys' Vietnam expansion, and Pine Labs' AI-powered bill pay feature were key highlights. The cautious sentiment was influenced by various corporate developments and global cues.

item.title: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price
item.description: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price 7 hours ago Vidya Wires Limited debuted on BSE at ₹52.13 per share, trading above its IPO issue price of ₹52.00. The listing reflects a modest premium of ₹0.13, representing approximately 0.25% gains over the offer price. The successful market debut enables regular trading of the company's shares on the exchange.

item.title: Hubtown Limited Receives Trading Approval for 21.32 Lakh Equity Shares
item.description: Hubtown Limited Receives Trading Approval for 21.32 Lakh Equity Shares 4 hours ago Hubtown Limited has secured trading approval from both NSE and BSE for 21,31,936 equity shares issued to promoters on preferential basis following warrant conversion. The shares, priced at ₹220 each (₹10 face value plus ₹210 premium), began trading on December 11, 2025, and are subject to a lock-in period until July 31, 2027.
